call on/upon somebody/something.translat: to formally ask someone to do something
The UN has called on both sides to observe the ceasefire.
call on somebody to do something
to visit someone for a short time
Why don’t you call on my sister when you’re in Brighton?
to formally ask someone to do something
She called on local employers to commit themselves to equal opportunities.
to visit someone for a short time
Small booksellers often don’t have time to see all the reps who call on them.
